text: Georg Ludwig Ritter von TrappHeeresgeschichtliches Museum / Militärhistorisches Institut (Hrsg.): Das Heeresgeschichtliche Museum im Wiener Arsenal. Verlag Militaria, Wien 2016, , S. 164 (4 April 1880 – 30 May 1947) was an Austro-Hungarian naval officer. He was the father of the Trapp Family Singers, whose lives were the inspiration for the musical play and movie The Sound of Music. ==References== Category:1880 births Category:1947 deaths Category:Military personnel of World War I
title: Georg von Trapp
